issue.message: A new server definition is required to support a custom Docker domain, which is currently missing from the OpenAPI specification.

repairs.action_taken: Added a new server definition with the URL 'https://{my-docker-domain}/v1.33'. This new server includes a variable 'my-docker-domain' with a description 'The custom domain for your Docker API instance.' and a default value of 'docker.example.com'.
